participant_1.background:
I have a hard time with my family, but I'm doing my best to work things out.
I try to wash my clothes at least once a week.
I play the guitar to express the thoughts that my weird mind can't.
My longest relationship was four years and I'm not sure if I'm ready for another one.
my favorite food is popcorn.

participant_2.background:
I'm an excellent caretaker for my pets.
My family members are all very supportive of my interests and always encourage me to explore new things.
i m a sixth grade teacher.
i am a professional gamer.
I woke up to find my three sisters had decorated my bedroom for my birthday.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
I am doing great! Just had my sisters help me with decorating my classroom for my first day of school!
Oh that sounds fun! What grade are you teaching?
I am teaching sixth grade! What are you up to today?
I am trying to work on my music, but it's hard to focus.
What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar, mostly folk music.
That is so cool! I used to play the guitar too, but I haven't played in a while.
Oh that's too bad! You should pick it back up!
I know, I really should! I miss it.
Well if you ever want to jam together, let me know!
I would love that! Thanks for the offer!
No problem! Always happy to meet new people who are into music.
Same here! I love meeting new people in general.
Me too! It's so interesting to learn about other people's lives.
I know right? It's amazing how different everyone's lives can be, but we're all still human at the end of the day.
Exactly! That's what I love about it.
